After executing the necessary hand seals, user creates a seal based on the [[Fire Release: Heavenly Prison]], capable of immobilising and burning the target. 

== Trivia ==
* The central symbol of this seal, like most of the fūinjutsu in the game, strongly resembles the symbol of the seals of the [[Uzumaki Clan]].
